00205 #if defined( LDMA_IRQ_HANDLER_TEMPLATE )
00206 /***************************************************************************/
00210 void LDMA_IRQHandler( void )
00211 {
00212   uint32_t pending, chnum, chmask;
00213 
00214   /* Get all pending and enabled interrupts */
00215   pending  = LDMA->IF;
00216   pending &= LDMA->IEN;
00217 
00218   /* Check for LDMA error */
00219   if ( pending & LDMA_IF_ERROR )
00220   {
00221     /* Loop here to enable the debugger to see what has happened */
00222     while (1)
00223       ;
00224   }
00225 
00226   /* Iterate over all LDMA channels. */
00227   for ( chnum = 0,                chmask = 1;
00228         chnum < DMA_CHAN_COUNT;
00229         chnum++,                  chmask <<= 1 )
00230   {
00231     if ( pending & chmask )
00232     {
00233       /* Clear interrupt flag. */
00234       LDMA->IFC = chmask;
00235 
00236       /* Do more stuff here, execute callbacks etc. */
00237     }
00238   }
00239 }
00240 #endif

00242 /***************************************************************************/
00248 void LDMA_DeInit( void )
00249 {
00250   NVIC_DisableIRQ( LDMA_IRQn );
00251   LDMA->IEN  = 0;
00252   LDMA->CHEN = 0;
00253   CMU_ClockEnable( cmuClock_LDMA, false );
00254 }
00255 
00256 /***************************************************************************/
00263 void LDMA_Init( LDMA_Init_t *init )
00264 {
00265   EFM_ASSERT( init != NULL );
00266   EFM_ASSERT( !( ( init->ldmaInitCtrlNumFixed << _LDMA_CTRL_NUMFIXED_SHIFT )
00267                  & ~_LDMA_CTRL_NUMFIXED_MASK ) );
00268   EFM_ASSERT( !( ( init->ldmaInitCtrlSyncPrsClrEn << _LDMA_CTRL_SYNCPRSCLREN_SHIFT )
00269                  & ~_LDMA_CTRL_SYNCPRSCLREN_MASK ) );
00270   EFM_ASSERT( !( ( init->ldmaInitCtrlSyncPrsSetEn << _LDMA_CTRL_SYNCPRSSETEN_SHIFT )
00271                  & ~_LDMA_CTRL_SYNCPRSSETEN_MASK ) );
00272   EFM_ASSERT( init->ldmaInitIrqPriority < ( 1 << __NVIC_PRIO_BITS ) );
00273 
00274   CMU_ClockEnable( cmuClock_LDMA, true );
00275 
00276   LDMA->CTRL = (   init->ldmaInitCtrlNumFixed     << _LDMA_CTRL_NUMFIXED_SHIFT     )
00277                | ( init->ldmaInitCtrlSyncPrsClrEn << _LDMA_CTRL_SYNCPRSCLREN_SHIFT )
00278                | ( init->ldmaInitCtrlSyncPrsSetEn << _LDMA_CTRL_SYNCPRSSETEN_SHIFT );
00279 
00280   LDMA->CHEN    = 0;
00281   LDMA->DBGHALT = 0;
00282   LDMA->REQDIS  = 0;
00283 
00284   /* Enable LDMA error interrupt. */
00285   LDMA->IEN = LDMA_IEN_ERROR;
00286   LDMA->IFC = 0xFFFFFFFF;
00287 
00288   NVIC_ClearPendingIRQ( LDMA_IRQn );
00289 
00290   /* Range is 0..7, 0 is highest priority. */
00291   NVIC_SetPriority( LDMA_IRQn, init->ldmaInitIrqPriority );
00292 
00293   NVIC_EnableIRQ( LDMA_IRQn );
00294 }

00296 /***************************************************************************/
00309 void LDMA_StartTransfer(  int ch,
00310                           LDMA_TransferCfg_t *transfer,
00311                           LDMA_Descriptor_t  *descriptor )
00312 {
00313   uint32_t tmp;
00314   uint32_t chMask = 1 << ch;
00315 
00316   EFM_ASSERT( ch < DMA_CHAN_COUNT );
00317   EFM_ASSERT( transfer != NULL );
00318   EFM_ASSERT( !( transfer->ldmaReqSel & ~_LDMA_CH_REQSEL_MASK ) );
00319 
00320   EFM_ASSERT( !( ( transfer->ldmaCtrlSyncPrsClrOff << _LDMA_CTRL_SYNCPRSCLREN_SHIFT )
00321                  & ~_LDMA_CTRL_SYNCPRSCLREN_MASK ) );
00322   EFM_ASSERT( !( ( transfer->ldmaCtrlSyncPrsClrOn << _LDMA_CTRL_SYNCPRSCLREN_SHIFT )
00323                  & ~_LDMA_CTRL_SYNCPRSCLREN_MASK ) );
00324   EFM_ASSERT( !( ( transfer->ldmaCtrlSyncPrsSetOff << _LDMA_CTRL_SYNCPRSSETEN_SHIFT )
00325                  & ~_LDMA_CTRL_SYNCPRSSETEN_MASK ) );
00326   EFM_ASSERT( !( ( transfer->ldmaCtrlSyncPrsSetOn << _LDMA_CTRL_SYNCPRSSETEN_SHIFT  )
00327                  & ~_LDMA_CTRL_SYNCPRSSETEN_MASK ) );
00328 
00329   EFM_ASSERT( !( ( transfer->ldmaCfgArbSlots << _LDMA_CH_CFG_ARBSLOTS_SHIFT )
00330                  & ~_LDMA_CH_CFG_ARBSLOTS_MASK ) );
00331   EFM_ASSERT( !( ( transfer->ldmaCfgSrcIncSign << _LDMA_CH_CFG_SRCINCSIGN_SHIFT )
00332                  & ~_LDMA_CH_CFG_SRCINCSIGN_MASK ) );
00333   EFM_ASSERT( !( ( transfer->ldmaCfgDstIncSign << _LDMA_CH_CFG_DSTINCSIGN_SHIFT )
00334                  & ~_LDMA_CH_CFG_DSTINCSIGN_MASK ) );
00335   EFM_ASSERT( !( ( transfer->ldmaLoopCnt << _LDMA_CH_LOOP_LOOPCNT_SHIFT )
00336                  & ~_LDMA_CH_LOOP_LOOPCNT_MASK ) );
00337 
00338   LDMA->CH[ ch ].REQSEL = transfer->ldmaReqSel;
00339 
00340   LDMA->CH[ ch ].LOOP =
00341     (   transfer->ldmaLoopCnt       << _LDMA_CH_LOOP_LOOPCNT_SHIFT     );
00342 
00343   LDMA->CH[ ch ].CFG =
00344     ( transfer->ldmaCfgArbSlots     << _LDMA_CH_CFG_ARBSLOTS_SHIFT     )
00345     | ( transfer->ldmaCfgSrcIncSign << _LDMA_CH_CFG_SRCINCSIGN_SHIFT   )
00346     | ( transfer->ldmaCfgDstIncSign << _LDMA_CH_CFG_DSTINCSIGN_SHIFT   );
00347 
00348   /* Set descriptor address. */
00349   LDMA->CH[ ch ].LINK = (uint32_t)descriptor & _LDMA_CH_LINK_LINKADDR_MASK;
00350 
00351   /* Clear pending channel interrupt. */
00352   LDMA->IFC = chMask;
00353 
00354   /* Critical region. */
00355   INT_Disable();
00356 
00357   /* Enable channel interrupt. */
00358   LDMA->IEN |= chMask;
00359 
00360   if ( transfer->ldmaReqDis )
00361   {
00362     LDMA->REQDIS |= chMask;
00363   }
00364 
00365   if ( transfer->ldmaDbgHalt )
00366   {
00367     LDMA->DBGHALT |= chMask;
00368   }
00369 
00370   tmp = LDMA->CTRL;
00371 
00372   if ( transfer->ldmaCtrlSyncPrsClrOff )
00373   {
00374     tmp &= ~_LDMA_CTRL_SYNCPRSCLREN_MASK
00375            | (~transfer->ldmaCtrlSyncPrsClrOff << _LDMA_CTRL_SYNCPRSCLREN_SHIFT);
00376   }
00377 
00378   if ( transfer->ldmaCtrlSyncPrsClrOn )
00379   {
00380     tmp |= transfer->ldmaCtrlSyncPrsClrOn << _LDMA_CTRL_SYNCPRSCLREN_SHIFT;
00381   }
00382 
00383   if ( transfer->ldmaCtrlSyncPrsSetOff )
00384   {
00385     tmp &= ~_LDMA_CTRL_SYNCPRSSETEN_MASK
00386            | (~transfer->ldmaCtrlSyncPrsSetOff << _LDMA_CTRL_SYNCPRSSETEN_SHIFT);
00387   }
00388 
00389   if ( transfer->ldmaCtrlSyncPrsSetOn )
00390   {
00391     tmp |= transfer->ldmaCtrlSyncPrsSetOn << _LDMA_CTRL_SYNCPRSSETEN_SHIFT;
00392   }
00393 
00394   LDMA->CTRL = tmp;
00395 
00396   BUS_RegMaskedClear(&LDMA->CHDONE, chMask);  /* Clear the done flag.     */
00397   LDMA->LINKLOAD = chMask;                    /* Enable descriptor load.  */
00398   BUS_RegMaskedSet(&LDMA->CHEN, chMask);      /* Enable channel.          */
00399 
00400   /* Critical region end. */
00401   INT_Enable();
00402 }

00404 /***************************************************************************/
00414 void LDMA_StopTransfer( int ch )
00415 {
00416   uint32_t chMask = 1 << ch;
00417 
00418   EFM_ASSERT( ch < DMA_CHAN_COUNT );
00419 
00420   INT_Disable();
00421 
00422   LDMA->IEN &= ~chMask;
00423   BUS_RegMaskedClear(&LDMA->CHEN, chMask);
00424 
00425   INT_Enable();
00426 }
00427 
00428 /***************************************************************************/
00438 bool LDMA_TransferDone( int ch )
00439 {
00440   bool     retVal = false;
00441   uint32_t chMask = 1 << ch;
00442 
00443   EFM_ASSERT( ch < DMA_CHAN_COUNT );
00444 
00445   INT_Disable();
00446   if (    ( ( LDMA->CHEN   & chMask ) == 0      )
00447        && ( ( LDMA->CHDONE & chMask ) == chMask ) )
00448   {
00449     retVal = true;
00450   }
00451   INT_Enable();
00452   return retVal;
00453 }
00454 
00455 /***************************************************************************/
00470 uint32_t LDMA_TransferRemainingCount( int ch )
00471 {
00472   uint32_t remaining, done, iflag;
00473   uint32_t chMask = 1 << ch;
00474 
00475   EFM_ASSERT( ch < DMA_CHAN_COUNT );
00476 
00477   INT_Disable();
00478   iflag  = LDMA->IF;
00479   done   = LDMA->CHDONE;
00480   remaining = LDMA->CH[ ch ].CTRL;
00481   INT_Enable();
00482 
00483   iflag    &= chMask;
00484   done     &= chMask;
00485   remaining = ( remaining
00486                 & _LDMA_CH_CTRL_XFERCNT_MASK )
00487               >> _LDMA_CH_CTRL_XFERCNT_SHIFT;
00488 
00489   if ( done || ( ( remaining == 0 ) && iflag ) )
00490   {
00491     return 0;
00492   }
00493 
00494   return remaining + 1;
00495 }
